title: Strategies for Utilizing Online Assessment Tools in Blended Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Online Learning Platform (e.g., Moodle) Experience and Foundational Language Learning Knowledge
context.additional_context: A blended learning model combining simulation/VR with online assessment tools in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment.

learning_goals: Learners can assess language communication skills in simulation/VR environments and incorporate feedback
Learners can self-diagnose weekly learning outcomes using Moodle-based online quizzes
Learners can adjust learning strategies by analyzing online assessment data
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
